title: completeEnrolment Script v0.0a (completeEnrolment)
description: Task list for the completeEnrolment script. Please set the Application Domain to completeEnrolment. This is to be a seperate config profile to allow Jamf to dynamically change tasks lists before the script gets to processing it, and to avoid replicating all the other settings across each task list. This config profile should be applied before restart, as the script will load the task list after restart.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title for the App, Command, Label, Policy, or Self Service Entry

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.description: Optional subtitle for the App, Command, Label, Policy, or Self Service Entry

enum_titles: Combine the subtitle with the command
Use supplied subtitle and replace with command when switching to backup

command.title: Primary Command
command.description: Command, Label, Policy, or Self Service URL (Mac App Store, or Jamf App Installer)

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: Web address, Path, or SF Symbol

successtest.title: Success test
successtest.description: File Path, or shell command to test with

successteam.title: Success Team ID
successteam.description: The Developer Team ID to check for

backupcommand.title: Backup Command
backupcommand.description: Command, Label, Policy, or Self Service URL (Mac App Store, or Jamf App Installer)
